channel.title: Space station 13
channel.description:
http://nanotrasen.com/
/tg/station 13 is a paranoia-laden roleplaying game set against the backdrop of a nonsensical, metal death trap masquerading as a space station. The game is 2D, sprite, and tile-based. It's written in BYOND, which accounts for its attrocious controls and limited graphical capability. Despite its shortcomings, it's amazingly fun for what it is. Prepare to lose many hours to it.
i've been playing on byond://play.insertplayer.com:1336, it's pretty cool. unfortunately i'm still a bit new, having fun wandering around and joining cults, electrifying soda machines and getting free cigarettes though... also accidentally disabling power and electrocuting myself in the waste disposal area...

item.title: Space station 13
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Fantastic game that is only hindered by Byond. Hint hint: http://spacestation13.com/?page_id=9
